text: Hans Folke "Hasse" Alfredson (28 June 1931 - 10 September 2017) was a Swedish actor, movie director, writer and comedian. He was born in Malmö, Sweden. He is known for his works with Tage Danielsson as the duo Hasse & Tage. Alfredson's 1985 movie False as Water won the award for Best Director at the 21st Guldbagge Awards. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1931 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Swedish movie actors Category:Swedish movie directors Category:Swedish writers Category:Swedish comedians Category:Actors from Malmö
title: Hans Alfredson
